actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act approved January 23, 1930, establishing the George Washington Birthplace National Monument, Virginia, to authorize the addition of certain lands to such monument, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire additional lands for the George Washington Birthplace National Monument in Virgina. Authorizes to be appropriated the sums necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act approved January 23, 1930, establishing the George Washington Birthplace National Monument, Virginia, to authorize the addition of certain lands to such monument, and for other purposes.
